short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with Pomodoro technique, task management, and site blocking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusBrew is your personal productivity companion, designed to help you stay focused and manage your time effectively. 
With a powerful Pomodoro timer, task management, and site blocking features, FocusBrew helps you brew the perfect focus for your work sessions.
